data.message:
My Stan 2 poem

He's here he's there,he's every fucking where!
Where you go I go,
I'm the one at 3am who shakes you awake,
The cold chill 
Sun break hot and you're still cold
I'm the traffic lights,the standing water keeping your car afloat-
Yeah I'm there man..
I'm in your veins,your head-I am you,
Can't you see it? The reflection looking back at you??..
Yeah that's me not you.
Since that night with the cassette...
Where you go I go the shadow
What's to come is the best yet-
I am the master and you the god,
Where you go I go..

That night opened me a new door,
A picture clear to see,
I with you and you with me..that night with the cassette-
So blatantly 
It was meant to be,
A new me.
Where you go I go, 
The shadow
I'm the one at 3am who shakes you awake,
Sun break hot and you're still cold,
I am the traffic lights, the standing water keeping your car afloat.

You would think I had remorse,some regret some tears?
All them years-passing me by, I can't cry! How can I!?..
My gf,my child, my family ,my job my life!
Man it was yours from the beginning and now I'm here.
The black mass at the corner of your sight,the shudders..the shivers..
Are you skeptic or believer?...
'Cos I'm there,
Where you go I go,the shadow..
And I will always be..
Man!
Can you not see?...
I'm still your biggest fan,
This is me...
This is Stan.
